title: RIOT BANNS WITHOUT EVEN LOOKING!!!
body:
riot....please....fix your method of banning....even tho u dont see full chat and u try to tell if this guy is the flamer (idiotic btw) turns out u dont even see my own chat...prof is THIS
for comments i will use: //--> (...)

3V3 PVP GAME
(teams: (me)lux - jhin - kayn VS sion - lissandra - kayn  )

xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: jhin u want vs sion or liss?
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: forgot that kayn is too broken in this map //--> (enemy kayn killed me after killing 3 times jhin)
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: kayn
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: i droped sion 1% hp 2 times
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: please help me with an aa
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: u feed and say that? //--> (jhin blamed me for died 2 times from kayn that both times he oneshot me)
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: not to mention dropping teamwork to 0
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: and proving u are 0
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: LOL
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: fed form jhin and now u can do that -.-  //--> (jhin still oshotting me coz no1 helps me and he is already fed)
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: when can we sur ? :P
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: nop
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: btw report jhin please for flaming me all game
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: kayn is just bad at game, i dont care about that....but jhin is flaming (also bad at game i dont care about that)
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: 5 times counted
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: srsly...end it please.. i dont have fun when im with flamers
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: wow....just wow
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: already did ;) //--> (enemy kayn tiped me to mute jhin)
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: lol
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: nice root //--> (insulting myself for useing lux's Q on sion's R and having no effect :P )
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: XD
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: what sion? //--> (sion was tolking to jhin who i had muted so i unmuted hom to see what they are tolking about)
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: sion u tolking to jhin?
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: AHAHAH
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: unmuted to see what u are tolking about
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: and he still flames?
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: kayn im not even trying man //--> (enemy kayn chased me and i knew even if he missed everything he could aa R me)
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: even if i hit everything i are fed and with this map i will die
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: ....guys...i fed? //--> (jihn still saying that i feed)
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: soin
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: did i feed?
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: when u get 2 free kill bot
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: and i lose 2 when sion was left with 1% towise
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: yeah right
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: riot:
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: cheacking YOUR chat...and kda in general
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: and think they got the results they need
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: and ofc bann the wrong guy //--> (irony :P )
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: yes having jhin flaming me
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: lol
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: dude
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: kayn can u please tell jhin that he is the 1 that fed u
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: rly...tell us who fed u
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: so he can shut up
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: DUDE
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: i did //--> (jgin asked me: didnt u say u muted me?)
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: then i unmuted u coz sion was tolking to no1
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: anw just play
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: ...u are telling me i fed and im flaming?
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: i am NOT
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: WTF
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: when did i flame???
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: all i did is refuse to take the fckin blame from him
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: i didnt say anything bad about him other than HE IS FLAMING
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: AND THATS NOT FLAMING
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: ........report lux? //--> (allay kayn said report lux....didnt gang didnt tell jhin he is bad and he should cut it out...but said report lux -.- )
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: omg
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: im out
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: this is what happened to my last acc and i got perma ban
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: coz i explained the noob flamer why is what he tells a lie (in here it's jhin)
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: IT DOES //--> (enemy kayn said it doesnt have an effect on if they report u when u didnt flame...irony agein)
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: SAME SHIT HAPPENED LAST ACC
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: i dont care
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: 10% of lol players are like this jhin
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: and other 50% are like this kayn....know nothing and report the guy who is getting flamed
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: i dont care
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: fckin bann my acc agein for refucing to take the blame of jhin's sht
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: i do
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: anw muted
xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx: 2 secs be4 i muted him he flamed my mom

replies.body:
Do you seriously not understand why you were punished?

"SAME SHIT HAPPENED LAST ACC" and "i dont care". "know nothing and report the guy who is getting flamed", no they reported you, who was flaming.

"fckin bann my acc agein" yeah, you kept flaming and they did. maybe don't bluff and they won't call it?

or you could just be a normal, decent, non-flaming person instead.
you work for riot?
Don't have to work for riot to have common sense about this situation.

so u are saying i deserved it...and u dont say much to sound smart...even tho u just tolk generally with nothing to show...
just so u know...i am 1 of the few people that ALWAYS stand up for any1 beeiing flamed...if some people fight..i make them stop...if some1 does smthing terrible and team all flame him..i tell them yes he did that but thats enough,,,not help him get back to game so we can win as team

(i now u dont belive me...u oly belive  / read what u want to read...)
You can stand up for victims all you want. Until you become the aggressor.

why are u so closed-headed (if im useing thi word right...i mean seeing only the side of riot..that i deserved ban..)
cant u com to my side and read this....u srsly tell me that saynig that this happendt to my last acc is a flame....that is what u said...that is how much u want to prove me wrong...u use as evidence smthing that is NOT

You're asking me to "come to your side". That's not how this works.

I'm on the side of logic, reason, and common sense. You're on the side of "waaaaaahhhhh i got banned and it must not be my fault i'm right please agree with me!!!!!!!" It's akin to anti-vaxxers saying "vaccines cause autism because I SAID SO". It's absurd.

lol i said come to my side coz u obviusely only see the side i deserved ban...
what i am asking for u is to see both sides..then pick witch side u want to support and how much each side has its rights....
unless u already id this and u give me 0% credid....if u did this then i apologize that i thought u didnt do it

I looked at your side. When I opened this post, my thoughts were this:

"Look for chat logs"

-found chat logs-

"Look through chat logs for punishable behavior"

-found punishable behavior-

-found a lot of punishable behavior-

-saw that OP basically taunts Riot into banning him and taunts his teammates to report him as well-

"Yep, this guy probably understands exactly why he was punished" (I have no doubt you understand why you were banned *again*)

"Yep, this guy won't accept any criticism/analysis of his logs" - so I didn't provide any. And I was right. You're the one refusing to admit your ban was accurate.
why not punish both sides?

Because here's what happens... Both sides comment the crime in this situation


Poster of this thread does is consistently enough that he finally got banned though, other person we don't know how often he does it as it could have been his first time.

Also other persons involved aren't on the boards showing if they got banned or not.


Only info we have is from this guy, who by his own logs proves he deserves it.


Otherside will be punished if he keeps up also though.

> [{quoted}](name=Chermorg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KGjgcXMh,comment-id=0000000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-07-29T22:11:14.083+0000)
> 
> I'm on the side of logic, reason, and common sense.

Hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahah, ahahhhh hahahahaahhahahahaahhahahahahahahaahahahahahahahhahahaha, hahahahahahahah... heh...heheheh..... heh... HAHAHAHhahahaahahahahhahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahah hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahaha, hahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahahah, hahahahahahahahahah... hahahah... haha... ha... ha.... ha....

omg I almost died there.... 

I think people crying to riot for reports about every little combination of our 26 letter alphabet they can think of, claiming it's violence and abuse and flaming and should be punished... is exactly the side of this argument that is illogical and "wahhhhhhhhhhhh wahhhhhhhhh". And I think the irony at having somebody try to straw man their way into calling the other side of this argument the cry babies is the funniest thing I have heard since George Carlin died.

It's LOGICAL that instead of perma banning anybody and everybody who says anything in a game that might possibly could somehow offend somebody (not naming any names) you should just mute the player.

It's REASONABLE that riot would stop banning the "upwards of 90% of players who receive permanent account suspensions are not trolls but regular players frustrated with the game" and start banning the people running around trolling those regular players into trying to use words (like a grown up person) to get their team to stop throwing a game and work together. There is a reason most perma banned players play at an LCS level (Anybody remember Tyler who only played Draven? Troll of trolls but his mechanics and skill were definitely pro level) because we ban the people who care MOST about the game.

It's COMMON SENSE to stop banning players who care the most about the game. The ones who yell at their team mates are doing so because they REALLY WANT TO WIN. Look it up, the data is everywhere to back me up on this. Toxic people are toxic because words SHOULD be the method people with COMMON SENSE and REASON and LOGIC use to get their team to smarten up. It's really the ONLY method one has to try and influence their fellow players. They are mad because you are ruining their games and they are yelling at you because they want/need you to get better and stop making mistakes that throw their game. They care the most. Yet we ban them for communicating because certain nameless and unspecified individuals are too sensitive and not mature enough to handle that communication. The funny thing about being offended is it's completely subjective.

If the color blue offends you, do you think it gives you any right to make everybody else stop wearing blue? It doesn't hurt you or impact your life in any way, do you think it is reasonable or logical to force your sensibilities and personal offenses onto the rest of the world? Any thinking individual would consider this absurd.

So how could a thinking individual, who possesses the faculties of logic and reason, ever think for even a moment that you being offended by a word or a letter combination should entitle you in any way to force your personal delicate sensibilities on everybody else?

Should we all stop eating steak because babies can't chew it? Some people simply aren't mature enough for language in general, let alone language on the internet. And it is not logical, rational or in any way sensible, common or otherwise, to think that censorship is the answer.

Do you know who we should censor? Children. Small children. Children who are immature and undeveloped. It is our job as adults to protect children from sensitive things that may negatively impact how they mature and grow, because they are in a delicate state where they are not strong enough or mature enough or in possession of enough reason and logical understanding of their surroundings to withstand those influences.

Are you a child? No? Then why do you insist on being treated like one?

I suggest a solution; all children have to play their own league of legends, and only mature adults capable of chewing steak should get to play together. Everybody who bans/reports/cries for words that can't be said in a 14A movie should be kicked out of adult league and forced into kiddy league. Where they should also remove all smoking, alchohol, cleavage, flesh above the knee, blood, gore, dead bodies and violence.

So we lose Gragas, Singed, Talon, Urgot, and pretty much any other champ who doesn't throw bananas, but at least nobody can be offended that way. Is that the game you want to play? Because LOGIC and REASON and COMMON SENSE say that if we continue on this path of violently suppressing all free speech and non-conformist thought on the basis it may offend the more immature, undeveloped individuals in the player base, that's exactly the game we're headed to.

People who cry and report for language should be banned from the internet. Since that's not possible, we should at least ban them from grown up league. Quick riot, make a new game client for the immature gamer! You've already got the chat system for it figured out. Then slap an "M for mature" rating on league and let the grown ups go back to playing without fear of a perma ban for criticizing their team mate just because they actually care about winning the game. I am SO SICK of this cry baby attitude on these forums and in the game.

TL, DR; offended by language? Go play my little pony or farmville, League is full of flesh, blood, booze and adrenaline. It's no place for children and I for one am beyond fed up with hearing all the crying over something as pathetic and pedantic as "WAH WAH HE SAID A WORD THAT HURT MY FEELINGS! I AM OFFENDED, DO SOMETHING WAH WAH!"

Wait, your saying he doesn't sound smart and then proceed to use tho, u, tolk, 1, any1, uncapped I, some1, smthing, and team all flame and u oly belive.

The irony of your comment.

Oh, and you deserved the ban.

here we go..anothing guy who wants to say smthing wrong to sound smart...
when i said sound smart...i ment:

the way he writes
they things he say
the rare words he uses
or grammar

pick one that u think i was refering to

Your use of ellipses really annoys me.

Also, he wasn't as you say "sounding smart"

a) He writes like a normal human

b) What he said made complete sense

c) Wait, he used an uncommon word? Where?

d) His grammar is fine.

wow...please dont post agein lol u just read what u want to read
i told u that u missunderstud on what thing i ewas tolking about when i said sound smart....and i gave u a list of choses making it OBVIUSE that i was refering to they meanning of the things he said....and u respond with a list answering with a list....just dont ask if u dont understand what some1 said

and btw u said that what he said isnt general???....just wow,....dont tolk to me please i cant speack with people who are like u..notgonan waist more time on you

Ok, person who is trying to sound smart, explain these words.
dont

waist 

Also, looking at your chat logs the ban seems deserved.
So much of your logs have the appearance of a negative attitude, and it would have been better for everyone probably if you had just muted earlier and spent more time playing than typing.
Whenever I run into toxicity I just mute and keep playing, and a lot of the times we end up winning.

(Cracks knuckles)

Let's break this one down.

a) I will post again if I want to, part of the privilege of the boards, I'm not going to stop because someone who has all of the grammar mastery of a four year old tells me to.

b) What was I misunderstanding? I don't understand that

c) I responded to each and every one of you choices, because hey, I'm flexible like that.

d) For why I respond to a list with a list, see above

e) I can't read that last bit, sorry
I think you should remove that last bit of A. It is not necessary and could potentially get you in trouble. ;(

I know you're from the EUNE server, but you seem to have a really good command of the English language.

Stop talking like you're either 12 or texting your friends. Start proofreading your posts. You are not being taken seriously partially because of your extremely negative and aggressive attitude, and partially because you type like you're texting/a child.
Doesn't take someone working for Riot to take one look and realize why you're punished.

srsly...your logic kills me...u are a clasick example of lol players....saddly lol is filled with people like you....
if u dont understand why your logic is wrong in 10 different ways...then i cant explain it to you enough...good day

> [{quoted}](name=xxxxxxVIPxxxxxx,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KGjgcXMh,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-07-29T21:55:53.582+0000)
>
> srsly...your logic kills me...u are a clasick example of lol players....saddly lol is filled with people like you....
> if u dont understand why your logic is wrong in 10 different ways...then i cant explain it to you enough...good day

I agree with him and the funny part is your banned and I'm not.

Which makes YOU the classic example of the toxic rager.

oh my god...u find WORDS to make me the bad guy?
WOW
your logic here is:
a guy come and kills a relative of yours...and u ell him u are sick for doing that...logic is u wee only 1 guy tolking..and call him a flamer for saying that.....even id that is the least thing he could ever say for the senario that he was just in....
congratz...o proven me how low community is when it comes to this game.........riot...sry u have such crappycommunity...u could be smthing good....but community made u what u are....a plase wit hno rights...no balance in behavior

simple example...if 4 premades bully theyr allay all game...and he respond EVEN SLIGHTLY back....thye will rpeort him (x4) and system will cheack only HIS chat...result...he might flamed back 1% of what they flamed him...but you can only see his chat...so all u know is that he is a flamer for you..and u bann him.....
simple example of why your system is not good....prove me wrong!!

You are trying to compare losing a video game to a relative of yours dying?

I think you have bigger problems than getting banned. Namely your inability to understand what is real/not, and your seeming addiction to this videogame to the point you flame people you perceive are losing the game for you, when it's a team game.
btw you didnt replay anything about my example...but ofc that part has nothing bad for you to critisize right???

Is the 'example' the 4-man premade?
If so, if they all were to verbally attack him it would be **EXTREMELY** easy for him to just mute them and continue with the game. He doesn't have to reply, but if he did reply, as long as he wasn't racist, griefing, swearing, or flaming, Riot would not ban him, because their auto-ban system is very good at it's job.

maybe i gave a wrong example....u are right... but u can get the point
i understand that i try to help community and as a result i lose my health and riot banns me...so yes...maybe i should leave it as it is and just afk it if i dont have fun

anw....as it turns out there is no lol player with logic....not saying this coz u didnt agree with me...saying it coz u gave me 0% credit (even hitler has a % of right on what he did....really really really small % but still not 0%)...
prof that u read a text and u are thinking how can i dessagree the most....hope u have good games on league..and have a nice day....
thank you for your time

>even hitler has a % of right on what he did....really really really small % but still not 0%

This has got to be the weirdest case of Godwin's Law ever...
Also: How did you figure this was a good argument to use? Hitler is a pretty good example of somebody whose good actions matter not at all because they are massively outweighed by the bad shit that he has done.

I mean... let's ignore your punishment and your chatlogs for a second. You have to admit that you went wrong **somewhere** in your life if you end up comparing yourself to Hitler in the forum of a video game... while trying to defend yourself.

i used hitler as the worst possble behaiviar i could think of at that moment..and i ment that even he has a 0.0001% right on what he doid (ofc he has a 99.99999% fault ) and here i get 0% ...less that hitler.....every1 tolks like im some1 worse than him
My eyes hurt from this lmao and yeah, this was a deserved ban, you're toxic.

Hmm, you really didn't flame hard at all really, it's just, you harassed them, asking for all chat to report someone falls under the category of hate harassment, and telling your teammates that they fed and are bad just hurts them in stressful ranked, being cocky to refuse communication from jhin in a 3v3 telling the world that you muted him while he/she/helicopter listens on you blows, cause the comments they made coulda been an apology,their side of the story, a certain factor that you missed, arrogant and ignorant, you continued to laugh at the jhin, for trying to have a understanding conversation with the enemy being more a of teammate than you. The most important thing in ranked is legit 0 high expectancy that your team will be perfect, while keeping a cool head(nearly impossible) and to play just right in a hard carry way, but still in a fun way to communicate with your team with "sound reasoning" because reports in ranked are severe.
This was the only game?
The important thing is you tried.
